articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: WHO warns of Covid-19 peaks in South America - RTE.ie
articles.description: The World Health Organization has warned that South America, especially Brazil, has been suffering complicated and severe Covid-19 crisis.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization has warned that South America, especially Brazil, has been suffering complicated and severe Covid-19 crisis.
The Americas have registered more than 62 million confirmed… [+6440 chars]
